Name: Concealment
About the game: Your life is in your hands Go to an abandoned village to find your missing brother. Explore the objects that come in your way. Solve the terrible mystery of this mysterious place. Concealment is a first-person psychological horror game. A game in which you need to solve the mystery of an abandoned ancient village. Story You receive a strange letter from your brother. He asks that you urgently come to an abandoned village where something strange is happening. Your goal is to find your brother and find out what caused the strange events. Features: Open for research location - Go wherever you want, explore the territory to your heart's content. Interactive items - You can pick up and examine items. Non-linear plot - Change the plot with your actions.
